resources.string: Your score will not be saved. Are you sure you want to leave?

In the game there are colored buttons that play music and change their color, you must repeat the rhythm exactly. In each round you will need to remember the previous rhythm and a new sound with its color so that in the following rounds you will need to remember more sounds and buttons. The game has three levels of different velocity and a different score. Try to bypass others and enter the high-score table.
No connection! Please connect to the Internet.
There is a temporary server problem.

Before entering the game you can choose a difficulty level. The difficulty levels vary according to the speed of the rhythm that will be shown to you. At each level you will get a different score. The higher the level, the greater the number of points for each click.
You can choose to turn on or off the game sounds and background music.
In the record table you can see the 15 players with the highest scores and the difficulty levels they played. Play and try to break records to appear high.
" Congratulations! You entered to high-scores table"
" Your score is too low, keep playing."

Choose who is \'player 1\' and who is \'player 2\'. The game begins when player 1 clicks a button. Then \'player 2\' should repeat the pressed button and add a step. Continue until one of the players does not remember the whole rhythm.
